text: Ubaye-Serre-Ponçon is a commune in the department of Alpes-de-Haute-Provence, southeastern France. It was formed on 1 January 2017 from the merger of the former communes of La Bréole (the seat) and Saint-Vincent-les-Forts.Arrêté préfectoral 16 December 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Alpes-de-Haute-Provence
title: Ubaye-Serre-Ponçon
